title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: The datetime values retrieved from a table are showing different formats in a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
EB: When inputting new Date() as content for three items and saving and previewing, the expected result is that all three items should show the same format. However, the actual result is that the data and text item are showing the same format, but the dynamic text item is showing a different format.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Input new Date() as content for three items.
2. Save and preview the form.
3. Verify the format of the datetime values in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
